title: Shop Dashboard
page_description: Manage your repair shop settings, availability, pricing, and job offers.
no_profile_description: Set up your shop information to start receiving job offers
no_profile_message: Complete the setup below to activate your shop profile and start managing jobs.
error_no_profile: No shop profile found. Please contact support.

offers.title: Active Job Offers
offers.description: New repair requests requiring your response
offers.no_offers: No active job offers at the moment.
offers.no_offers_hint: New jobs will appear here when they match your capabilities.
offers.response_error: Failed to respond to job offer
offers.new_offers_hint: New offers will appear here when available.
offers.job_accepted_description: You have successfully accepted this job offer.
offers.job_declined_description: You have declined this job offer.
offers.price_offer_description: Submit your pricing for insurer approval
offers.insurer_approved: Approved by insurer - awaiting customer confirmation

price_offer.title: Offer Price
price_offer.description: Set the glass type, damage assessment, and your price offer
price_offer.notes_placeholder: Add any notes about the repair...
price_offer.success: Price offer submitted for insurer review

active_jobs.title: Active Jobs
active_jobs.no_jobs_hint: Accept job offers to start tracking their progress here.

profile_setup.title: Complete your shop profile to access the dashboard
profile_setup.complete_profile: Please complete your shop profile to continue.
profile_setup.check_email: Please check your email and click the verification link to complete signup.
profile_setup.error_create: Failed to create shop profile. Please try again.
profile_setup.error_already_exists: An account with this email already exists. Please use the Sign In tab instead.

calendar.title: Shop Calendar
calendar.description: View and manage your availability, appointments, and job offers in calendar format
calendar.availability_added_desc: New availability slot has been added

status_controls.title: Job Status Controls
status_controls.description: Update the job status and notify the insurer in real-time
status_controls.no_actions: This job is {{status}} - no further actions available

descriptions.start_job: Mark this job as in progress

dialogs.notes_placeholder: Add any notes about this status change...
dialogs.cancel_description: Are you sure you want to cancel this job? This action cannot be undone and the insurer will be notified immediately.
dialogs.cancel_reason_placeholder: Please provide a reason for cancelling this job...

status_controls.info: Status updates are sent to the insurer within 5 seconds and logged for auditing

documents.upload_description: Upload the invoice (PDF) and completion proof photo before marking the job as complete
documents.before_complete: Before marking the job as complete, please upload the invoice and completion proof photo.
documents.proof_formats: JPG, PNG, or other image formats â€¢ Maximum file size: 5MB
documents.both_required: Both invoice and completion proof are required
documents.success_description: Your invoice and completion proof have been uploaded and sent to the insurer.

toast.uploaded_description: Invoice and completion proof have been submitted successfully

validation.invalid_invoice_type: Invoice must be a PDF file
validation.invoice_too_large: Invoice file must be less than 10MB
validation.invalid_proof_type: Completion proof must be an image file (JPG, PNG, etc.)
validation.proof_too_large: Image file must be less than 5MB
validation.missing_documents: Please upload both invoice and completion proof

viewer.title: Completion Documents
viewer.no_documents: No completion documents have been uploaded yet
viewer.uploaded_on: Invoice and completion proof uploaded on {{date}}
viewer.photo_evidence: Photo evidence of completed repair work
